Penn is deeply committed to fostering a culture that welcomes a diverse set of customers and dedicated team members.  
The Company has been consistently ranked in the top two as “Employer of First Choice” over the last nine years in the 
Bristol Associates-Spectrum Gaming’s Executive Satisfaction Survey. In addition, as a long-standing good corporate 
citizen, Penn is also committed to being a trusted and valued member of its communities and a responsible steward  
of our finite natural resources.
